alanMistakes: Alan angalakwitse. Gwiritsani ntchito chiweruzo cha zamankhwala. 7/25
name: Dzina
noCodeLine: Palibe kapena kodi yolakwika? Lumikizanani nafe apa
eyeMarqueeLine2: Ndingaone bwanji optic disc pogwiritsa ntchito Arclight?
eyeMarqueeLine3: Mwamuna 25, diso lofiira masiku 3, amaopa kuwala, kuona kwatsika pang’ono
eyeMarqueeLine5: Kodi katarakti yobadwa nayo iyenera kutumizidwa mwamsanga?
eyeMarqueeLine6: Mkazi 65, masomphamvu ofooka, alibe magalasi. Kutsogolo kuli bwino, lens yatokota
eyeMarqueeLine7: Amayi akuda nkhawa: mwana ali ndi pupil yoyera, safika kuona diso limenelo
earMarqueeLine2: Kodi ndingawone tympanic membrane ndi Arclight?
earMarqueeLine3: Mnyamata 16, pinna ikupweteka masiku 2, ikuluma, kumva kuli bwino
earMarqueeLine6: Mwamuna 73, kumva kufooka. Canal sikuwoneka bwino; ndikuona wax yokha
geoInfoText: Dinani "Kupeza malo" kuti mugawane malo enieni (lat/long) kuti mupeze malangizo abwinoko.
frontOfEyeText:
Yang’anani ndi fananizani maso: molunjika, chakumanja, chakumanzere, pamwamba, pansi
Yandikirani, mugwire bwino. Fufuzani: mapepi a maso, conjunctiva, cornea, pupil
Gwiritsani ntchito fluoro kuzindikira mabala kapena zilonda za cornea
fundalReflexText:
Chipinda chimdimadzi, mwana ali bata; patali pa dzanja—fananizani ma-reflex
Ofanana: kuwala, mtundu, shape
Yandikirani kuti muwone: chibayo, cataract, RB, Vit Haem
backOfEyeText:
Gwiritsani diso lamanja kuwona lamanja la wodwalayo; lamanzere ku lamanzere
Wodwalayo aone molunjika osati kuwala; yandikirani mupeze optic disc (dilate = kuwona bwino)
Onani disc: mphaka, mtundu, cup. Tsatirani mitsa ya magazi, kenaka pemphani wodwalayo kuti aone kuwala kuti muwone macula
additionalText_eye:
Dziwani ma-disc: wamba, wotupa, mitsa yatsopano, wacuppedwa, wafota
>Limbikirani kuchita<
allAroundEarText:
Onani: pinna, tragus, mastoid kuti mupeze kubayika, kutupa kapena kutulukira
Sungani pinna mosamala, muwone ngati alipobe ululu
earCanalText:
Pindikitsani mutu, kamangirani Arclight monga pena
Dhonzani pinna mmwamba/mbuyo (akulu) kapena pansi/mbuyo (ana)
Ikani speculum (4.5 mm akulu, 2.5 mm ana), chotsani tsitsi, pindikitsani ngati kuli kofunika
Onani: wax, zinyalala, matenda
tympanicMembraneText:
Pezeni handle ya malleus, kuwala kochira ndi attic
Onani: mtundu, malo, kuwonekera
Yang’anani dzenje, madzi kapena zipsera
additionalText_ear:
Dziwani TM: wamba, wofiira, wotupa, wochepa, wadulika
>Limbikirani kuchita<
generalObservationText:
Yang’anani mphini, kusintha kwa mtundu ndi kugawidwa
Kokani khungu pang’ono kuti muwone mawonekedwe, kutentha kapena kuwawa
uvLightText:
Mu chipinda chamdima, onani kuwala kwa fluorescence:
tinea (buluu-chobiriwira), pityriasis versicolor (mkuwa-orendi), erythrasma (korali-wofiira), vitiligo (buluu-woyera), acne (wofiira-orendi), nits (buluu wofewa)
dermoscopyText:
Gwirani Arclight polariser monga pena, onani: ABCDE (Asymmetry, Border, Colour, Diameter >6 mm, Evolving)
Fufuzani: PDSBV (pigment network, dots, streaks, buluu-woyera, vascular)
additionalText_skin:
Dziwani lesion: wamba, womwe ungakhale chiwopsezo, wotupa
>Limbikirani kuchita<
aboutAlanText:
Alan ndi wothandizira wa AI pa kuyezetsa maso, makutu ndi khungu. Amaonetsa chitsanzo cha chinenero ndi logic ya ma symbol. Wamphamvu, wodalirika, wamakono.

Chidziwitso chachipatala, cha m’madera komanso zithunzi zasankhidwa kuti zigwirizane ndi antchito azachipatala ndi adoctor a m’banja. Kukambirana kwachidule kumapereka chotsatila ndi dongosolo losamalira. Arclight imagwiritsidwa ntchito pa siteji iliyonse.
instructionsIntro: Alan ndi wothandizira wa AI kwa ophunzira komanso anthu amene nthawi zina amakumana ndi mavuto a maso, makutu kapena khungu. Lembani kapena yonetsani momveka; pewani kuzulula mayina kapena zambiri zomwe zingawadziwitse. Onani bwino mutu/maso/mbali yofunika ndikuunika maso ndi makutu onse awiri. Mwayi wabwino!
instructionsPatientPrompt: Fotokozani kwa Alan za wodwala wanu:
instructionsUseArclight_default: Gwiritsani Arclight: kutsogolo, fundal reflex, kumbuyo kwa diso.
instructionsUseArclight_eye: Gwiritsani Arclight: kutsogolo, fundal reflex, kumbuyo kwa diso.
instructionsJustRight_eye: Mwamuna 25, diso lofiira masiku 3. Palibe mankhwala kapena mavuto am’maso kale. Ululu, maso akuyenda madzi, dontho loyera pa cornea. Pupil wamba, kuona 6/12; diso lina 6/6.
instructionsTooMuch_eye: Mwamuna wabwera lero ndi diso lofiira, akuganiza kuti chakudya chimamukhudza. Ndikuona maso ali madzi ndi m'mphepete ofiira. Akufuna thandizo; akuda nkhawa ndi cornea ndi ululu. Akuti, 'Ichi ndi chiyani?'
instructionsAdditionalQuery_eye: Alan amasankha mafunso ophunzira a maso: Iritis ndi chiyani? Kodi ndingaone bwanji retina?
instructionsJustRight_ear: Mwamuna 25, khutu lofiira masiku 3. Palibe mankhwala kapena mavuto kale. Ululu, khutu likutuluka. Gubudu lofiira; kumva kwachepa khutu loipa koma kwabwino lina.
instructionsTooMuch_ear: Mwamuna wabwera ndi khutu lofiira, akuganiza chakudya chimakhudza. Ndikuona kutuluka ndi m'mphepete ofiira. Akuda nkhawa ndi kumva ndi ululu; akuti, 'Ichi ndi chiyani?'
instructionsAdditionalQuery_ear: Alan amasankha mafunso a makutu: Otitis media ndi chiyani? Ndingatsuke bwanji khutu?
instructionsJustRight_skin: Mwamuna 25, chigamba chofiira masiku 3. Palibe mankhwala kapena mavuto kale. Khungu likupweteka komanso likukwiyitsa.
instructionsTooMuch_skin: Mwamuna wabwera ndi khungu lofiira, akuganiza chakudya chimakhudza khungu. Ndikuona kupweteka ndi m'mphepete ofiira. Akuda nkhawa ndi pigment ndi kukwiyika; akuti, 'Ichi ndi chiyani?'
instructionsAdditionalQuery_skin: Alan amasankha mafunso a khungu: Eczema ndi chiyani? Kodi ndingaone bwanji pigment network?
instructionText: Alan ndi AI wothandiza ophunzira ndi anthu omwe nthawi zina amakhala ndi mavuto a maso, makutu kapena khungu. Lembani kapena fotokozani momveka bwino, pewani zambiri zodziwitsa.
